Anna University - Department of Technical Education

Sarjapur Road, Bangalore
NIRF :13
Anna University is a technical university in Chennai, India. It was established in 1978 and offers higher education in engineering, technology, architecture, and applied sciences. The university also promotes research and collaboration between academia and industry
Admission to all the B.Tech Programmes for the year 2024 is based on any one of the following: Candidates must have at least an intermediate-level degree and a PCM score of at least 50%. Candidates must have a 10+2 with 45% aggregate. Candidates must have passed class 12 with a minimum of 50% in the English subject. The upper age limit for a candidate is 25 years. Candidates must be a minimum of 157 centimeters in height and a minimum of 48 kg in weight.
